DataElement.preferredName: Study Patient Reported Outcome Measures Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A reason different than the one(s) previously specified describing the survey measures that are completed by the patient which help assess patient status with regards to pain, mobility, quality of life, ability to perform daily tasks or notable events in a clinical study.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:Survey measures that are completed by the patient which help assess patient status with regards to pain, mobility, quality of life, ability to perform daily tasks or notable events in a clinical study.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A detailed critical inspection; a research project.

Concepts.definition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.

Property.preferredDefinition: Survey measures that are completed by the patient which help assess patient status with regards to pain, mobility, quality of life, ability to perform daily tasks or notable events in a clinical study.

Concepts.definition: Survey measures that are completed by the patient which help assess patient status with regards to pain, mobility, quality of life, ability to perform daily tasks or notable events in a clinical study.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs
